title: EasyUCS ucs system config fcoe_storage_ports section
description: EasyUCS ucs system config fcoe_storage_ports section JSON schema

fabric.description: Fabric ID of FCoE Storage Port ("A" or "B")

slot_id.description: Slot ID of FCoE Storage Port

port_id.description: Port ID of FCoE Storage Port

aggr_id.description: Aggregate ID of FCoE Storage Port (for Breakout Ports)

user_label.description: User Label of FCoE Storage Port

vsan.description: Name of VSAN assigned to FCoE Storage Port

vsan_fabric.description: Fabric ID of VSAN assigned to FCoE Storage Port

admin_state.description: Admin State of FCoE Storage Port
